entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
